description: An application submitted under Section 96a of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 for a non-material amendment in connection with the planning permission (DC/23/130975) dated 20 October 2023, in order to allow:Changes to the proposal include: Alterations to the internal layouts to incorporate protected escape routes from the upper floors and living spaces; Alterations to the fenestration, including repositioning of windows and doors to suit new internal configuration; Provide openings to the glazing to allow for natural ventilation to the dwellings; Minor changes to the footprint and form of the buildings to resolve potential construction complications at Garages to the rear of Creeland Grove SE6.
site_name: GARAGES TO THE REAR OF, CREELAND GROVE, LONDON, SE6 4LE
